org.apache.hadoop.hbase.snapshot

类 SnapshotInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.AbstractHBaseTool
      • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.snapshot.SnapshotInfo
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable, org.apache.hadoop.util.Tool

    @InterfaceAudience.Public
public final class SnapshotInfo
extends AbstractHBaseTool
    Tool for dumping snapshot information.
    1. Table Descriptor
    2. Snapshot creation time, type, format version, ...
    3. List of hfiles and wals
    4. Stats about hfiles and logs sizes, percentage of shared with the source table, ...

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  SnapshotInfo.SnapshotStats
      Statistics about the snapshot How many store files and logs are in the archive How many store files and logs are shared with the table Total store files and logs size and shared amount

                                                          SnapshotDescription snapshot)

      • getSnapshotStats

        public static SnapshotInfo.SnapshotStats getSnapshotStats(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf,
                                                          org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.protobuf.generated.SnapshotProtos.SnapshotDescription snapshotDesc,
                                                          Map<org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path,Integer> filesMap)
                                                   throws IOException
        Returns the snapshot stats
        参数:
        conf - the Configuration to use
        snapshotDesc - HBaseProtos.SnapshotDescription to get stats from
        filesMap - Map store files map for all snapshots, it may be null
        返回:
        the snapshot stats
        抛出:
        IOException

      • getSnapshotsFilesMap

        public static Map<org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path,Integer> getSnapshotsFilesMap(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf,
                                                                          AtomicLong uniqueHFilesArchiveSize,
                                                                          AtomicLong uniqueHFilesSize,
                                                                          AtomicLong uniqueHFilesMobSize)
                                                                   throws IOException
        Returns the map of store files based on path for all snapshots
        参数:
        conf - the Configuration to use
        uniqueHFilesArchiveSize - pass out the size for store files in archive
        uniqueHFilesSize - pass out the size for store files shared
        uniqueHFilesMobSize - pass out the size for mob store files shared
        返回:
        the map of store files
        抛出:
        IOException

        public static void main(String[] args)
